Question: Dongguan Sanke Electronic Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Sanke Electronic Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Power Tool Batteries

- Professional factory with 10+ years of experience
- Offers one-stop solutions for tooling, injection, BMS, and battery packs
- Factory covers an area of 30,000 square meters and hires 400+ employees
- Monthly production capacity of around 350,000 pieces of battery
- Offers nearly 500 models of power tool batteries
- Products sold to Europe, the United States, Australia, Russia, Netherlands, France, Germany, and 50+ countries and regions
- ISO 9001-certified with CE, CB, PSE, and FCC certificates
- Supports OEM service and has a high-level engineering team for product design
- Recently developed BMS with 7-protections
- Integrated mold design and manufacturing, plastic injection, SMT processing, and lithium battery assembly
- Warehouse with temperature and humidity controllers
- Marketing center responsible for domestic and foreign sales
- Exhibiting at CES 2024, booth no. 53771
Summary_cn:
东莞三科电子技术有限公司

产品：电动工具电池

- 专业工厂，拥有10多年经验
- 提供模具制造、注塑、BMS和电池组的一站式解决方案
- 工厂占地面积3万平方米，拥有400多名员工
- 月产能约为35万件电池
- 提供近500种型号的电动工具电池
- 产品销往欧洲、美国、澳大利亚、俄罗斯、荷兰、法国、德国和50多个国家和地区
- ISO 9001认证，拥有CE、CB、PSE和FCC证书
- 支持OEM服务，拥有高水平的工程团队进行产品设计
- 最近开发了带有7项保护功能的BMS(电池管理系统)
- 拥有整合式模具设计和制造、塑料注塑、SMT加工、锂电池组装的能力
- 带有温湿度控制器的仓库
- 销售中心负责国内外销售
- 将参加2024年CES展览，展位号53771
